channel.description: Recent content in QGIS Foundation on QGIS Web Site

item.title: Annual General Meetings
item.description: Project Overview Maps Screenshots Case studies Plugins Visual Changelogs Community Get involved Certification Programme QGIS Foundation Charter Annual General Meetings Annual Reports Finance Project Organisation Infrastructure Brand Guidelines Contributor Credits Meetings QGIS Developer Meetings Reimbursements for Developer Meetings QGIS User Meetings Mailing Lists Local User Groups Members Blogs Resources Documentation Installation guide Testing Roadmap Reports OGC Certification Performance Books Support FAQ Bug Reporting Communication channels Commercial support StackExchange Security QGIS Metrics Plugins Metrics Blog Funding Donate Donors Membership Members Past Members Goodies Download Archive Annual General Meetings ¶ Starting in 2016 coinciding with the establishment of a formal legal entity (Swiss “Verein”), we hold a virtual annual general meeting where QGIS Voting Members approve the budget for the coming year, the financial report for the past year, elect any new project members and so on.
